column1: Uchi////I thought I was going to drop a buttload of cash on this place
column3: you can definitely spend spend spend here
column4: but the happy hour here is actually a really good deal.  Some of the items can be lacking in size on the HH menu (like the walu walu) which is expected.  However
column5: it was still really good.  The rolls on the HH menu were also a good deal
column6: and 3 dollar sake?!?!  Where else can you find that?  Service was very nice and it was a great experience overall.
